name.str: pair of XL demon chitin arm guards
name.str_pl: pairs of XL demon chitin arm guards

description: A pair of arm guards crafted from the carefully cleaned and pruned red exoskeletons of demon spiders.  Fire-resistant and very durable.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
Leg and body armor crafted from the carefully cleaned and pruned red exoskeletons of demon spiders.  Fire-resistant and very durable.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

A helmet crafted from the carefully cleaned and pruned red exoskeletons of demon spiders.  Covers the entire head; fire-resistant and very durable.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
